reviewtext: I bought this for traveling with a D300s and 17-55 2.8 attached.They fit perfectly, and there is even a couple pockets for other goodies.When I travel, I don't like having my camera out, so this case keeps it hidden and safe. When I need to take a shot, it is quick and easy to get the camera out.The D700 fits as well.Highly Recommended.
summary: Does exactly what I bought it for.
